metadata.name: Shell32 DLL Execution in Suspicious Directory
metadata.comment: Detects shell32.dll executing a DLL in a suspicious directory

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shell32.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('control_rundll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%appdata%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%localappdata%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%temp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%tmp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\users\\public\\'))))

output.summary: Detects shell32.dll executing a DLL in a suspicious directory
